thread.section_title: Premier Dead Sea USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Premier Dead Sea USA | www.premierdeadsea-usa.com
thread.title: Kathryn
thread.title_full: Premier Dead Sea USA reviewed by Kathryn

author: Kathryn
title: Kathryn
text: The velvet body soufflé and the cashmere soufflé are amazing for hands that get worked! The fragrnace in both could be unisex especially the velvet, even my husband uses it because it's not feminine. The body soufflé doesn't leave your hands or body feeling like there is any residual oily or wet texture because it just knows where the moisture needs to go and gets right on it. It's a staple in my home. Give it try and you'll feel the difference compared to other lotions.
